issue.title: [R] Fix ExecPlan binding annotations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The minimal build failed with undefined symbols because some of the ExecPlan bindings require ARROW_DATASET but our annotations in R didn't reflect that.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14195?focusedCommentId=17423357) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11290
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11290>
